attributes.review: so i was sitting there in my kitchen minding my own business and i wanted to take a look at our oh so lovely president and his campaign, as one does bc he’s incredibly good looking and handsome and everyone wants to just stare at him. WELL i was greeted by a NAKED CHEETO and i have to say i spit my pizza out all over the room and then proceeded to repeatedly vomit. it’s like this app made me contract the stomach bug. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!!! i am SCARRED for LIFE now thanks to the wonderful bunker boy and this not so wonderful app.
attributes.title: I THREW UP

attributes.review:
First off the Cheeto puff was naked soon As I got on the app he was putting tanning spray on himself with his balls 🏀 out .🤢🤮🤮🤕😷🤒

Also my dog chewed up my dog 🐕 because he was so mad for what he saw and my posters and my couch 🛋 the Cheeto said when I signed up he wrote I’m gonna kill black people and I will not put anyone in jail except for black people because I’m president and that powerful 🤮😰

I can literally write 20 pages of why this app needs to be taken down and he doesn’t need to be anyone’s president bc he is brainwashing people to like him I’m and my friend almost pasted out looking at him like really... that’s what y’all do now make people pass out really 🤬

I will sueing trust and believe that .🤬🤬😤😤😤😤
attributes.title: Unbelievable(so disappointed🤢🤮)

attributes.review: So when I first downloaded the app everything went down hill really fast. When I first downloaded it a VIRUS was sent TO MY PHONE and completely fried it I am appalled and will be taking this to court IF I HAVE TO. I’d advise you to PLEASE remove this app or many more people will hear about this. ASAP. Another thing when I opened the app and went the home page all that was on the page was child pornography and that is HIGHLY illegal!!!!!!
attributes.title: REMOVE THIS APP IMMEDIATELY

attributes.review: I got this app but when I open it up I always seem to see this huge orange Cheeto pop up everywhere. He looks really deformed and makes me feel supper uncomfortable 🤢. Half of the time I don’t even know what he’s saying I’m here too tell the owners of this app that they need to fix everything 😬and I’ll let them know that someone has hacked there account and he looks orange he’s big and his hair is like a rag dolls hair. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 😎👴🏼
attributes.title: Who allowed this 😬🤮

attributes.title: shows porn stream gods menu instead

attributes.review:
My daughter said she was downloading a game about a Cheeto and his crayon box friends. I was disappointed to find out this app was politically incorrect and also dangerous for my child to see an orange ding dong on her tablet. She has nightmares of a Cheeto chasing her EVERY NIGHT. Apple NEEDS to delete this horrific app before I contact my lawyers. I feel extremely attacked and would like to speak to the managers of this company. Now! 😡🤬 
P.S. Trump=🤡👎🏼 no regrets
attributes.title: Highly inappropriate for my 4 year old.

attributes.title: Horrible 🤮 (traumatizing) stream gods menu✨

attributes.review: When I open the app I was horrified to see a horrendous photo Of bunker boy 🤢 I then scrolled and was pummeled by more horrendous bunker boy photos. After being pummeled by horrendous photos I left the app and when I did bunker boy appeared and told me to take another look so I did and when I did the was a naked picture of him with a Santa hat. Under that was a picture of him without his horrendous toupee and I had to leave because my eyes needed time to recover.
attributes.title: My eyes are burning

attributes.review:
THIS APP IS VERY TRAUMATIZING😔 
EVERY TIME I OPEN THE APP I SEE A CheETTO MAN🐛 AND YOUR ASKING WHY A CHETTO MAN WOULD BE SOOO TRAUMATIZING 🙄 well this is what happened... one day I was minding my own Business and then a old man named crackle came up to me (he smelled like pickles🥵🥴) and offered me CHETTOs and I took them and walked away then the craziest THING happened to me right after😖😣😵 a really big cheese man ran to me and TOOK THE CHETTOS!!!!🥺🥶🥴 SO NOW EVERY TIME I OPEN THE APP I AM REMINDED BY MY STOLEN CHETTOS🤭🤯💅 THE CHESSE MAN STILL haunts me in my dreams 🥺😿😖 so be careful for the big cheese man he is still out there 🧀🧀🤭🥵🥴🥰
attributes.title: 😾😤SCARY APP🤬😿

attributes.review: hello Mr. Donald Trump🤬i have some words i have to say i was so enthusiastic to download this “lovely” app to see trump bae🥰! then was quickly terrified 😱by the fact my fish grew legs and started speaking! he said “trump 2020 on a gravestone!😻” i was in shock! not only that! when i opened the app i saw a mini cheeto puff on the screen i was very much disturbed as to how inappropriate this was and how can such size even exist! my screen glitched then i saw barron trump BEGGING for help from his cheeto father 🤯 horrible app!🤬
attributes.title: ugly app
